channel.title: Visit Space Coast Launches & Events
channel.description: Automated feed of Space Coast launches and events

item.title: Launch: Falcon 9 Block 5 | MTG-S1
item.description: Status: Go Second of EUMETSAT’s third generation of weather satellite.

item.title: Launch: Falcon 9 Block 5 | Starlink Group 10-25
item.description: Status: Go A batch of satellites for the Starlink mega-constellation – SpaceX’s project for space-based Internet communication system.

item.title: Launch: Falcon 9 Block 5 | Starlink Group 10-28
item.description: Status: TBC A batch of satellites for the Starlink mega-constellation – SpaceX’s project for space-based Internet communication system.

item.title: Event: July 4th Symphony Under the Stars
item.description: Status: Join your Brevard Symphony Orchestra this July 4th for our FREE annual Symphony Under the Stars concert at Cocoa Riverfront Park. Be sure to bring a chair or blanket as you enjoy a free concert filled with patriotic favorites. The concert starts at 8:00 p.m. with fireworks starting at 9:15...

item.title: Event: Cocoa Beach Centennial Celebration
item.description: Status: Experience the best of Cocoa Beach with an unforgettable weekend of celebration! Saturday, July 5th, kicks off with an exciting indoor Pickleball Tournament at The Rec Center, and a free swim at the city pool. In the afternoon, you won’t want to miss the Centennial Celebration Street Party—a lively event...

item.title: Event: Cocoa Beach Air Show
item.description: Status: Experience the thrill of aviation as the 2025 Cocoa Beach Air Show takes to the skies! Witness breathtaking aerobatic performances, military jet demonstrations, and high-flying stunts over the stunning coastline. Bring the whole family for an unforgettable weekend of aviation excitement right on the beach!
